title: PublicationsModule
description:
Optative module to be included in the CV template.
This one is about publications.
It is an array listing the entries to be generated in the .bib file before the LaTeX compilation.

isDOI.description:
Bool that defines if the data is DOI-based or custom.
 If it's DOI-based, then the fetching of the .bib info can be automated.

DOI.description:
The DOI itself, to be put only if `isDOI` is set to true.
 Please adhere to DOI standards.

pubType.description: The type that will be set as entry type in the .bib file.

author.description: The author of the entry. Please adhere to .bib standards.

url.description: Link pointing to where the publication can be found.

pubDate.description: Date of publication. Please adhere to RFC stadards about dates.

notDOI.description:
If the publication is not DOI-based, then a minimum of info is needed to generate the .bib entry.
To be put only if `isDOI` is set to false.
